Articles.Title: Jada Pinkett Smith shows how her hair is growing: Like I'm trying to come back
Articles.Description: Five years ago, Jada Pinkett Smith, Hollywood actress and wife of Will Smith, announced to the world the illness she was suffering from. The movie star was suffering from alopecia
